# Test Correlation Table

```{r cars, echo=FALSE, results='asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
d <- mtcars[,1:5]
corr <- furniture::tableC(d)
CorTable(
  dataset = d,
  table = corr,
  name= "randomId"
)
```
